pullrequest.title: Show and Revoke permissions in User Metrics

content.raw: They are not really needed. Taking a closer look, the `e.detail.resource` should always match `this.selectedMetric.resource_id`, as it comes from `this.$.grant.get(this.selectedMetric.resource_id)`. This is done to refresh the item's permissions shown. I will fire a notification error to state that there was an "error showing the list of user permissions" instead.
content.html: They are not really needed. Taking a closer look, the e.detail.resource should always match this.selectedMetric.resource_id, as it comes from this.$.grant.get(this.selectedMetric.resource_id). This is done to refresh the item's permissions shown. I will fire a notification error to state that there was an "error showing the list of user permissions" instead.
